member.name: T:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ContainerListView
member.summary: Provides a ListView control in detail mode that provides containers for each cell in a row/column. The container can hold almost any object that derives directly or indirectly from Control.

members.member: the visible portion of the header control
the visible portion of the detail area
each column header and the filler column
each area that will allow column resizing
each area that will allow column resizing
each area that will allow column resizing
